languages.text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Голос Мастера вокса, обычно спокойный и сдержанный, предательски подрагивает, пробиваясь сквозь легкий шум статики.{/n}"Я получила сообщение о перестрелке на нижней палубе. Вам удалось навести порядок? В каком состоянии Идира?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Голос Мастера Вокса, обычно спокойный и сдержанный, предательски подрагивает, пробиваясь сквозь легкий шум статики.{/n}"Я получила сообщение о перестрелке на нижней палубе. Вам удалось навести порядок? В каком состоянии Идира?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан?" {n}Голос Мастера вокса, обычно спокойный и сдержанный, предательски подрагивает, пробиваясь сквозь легкий шум статики.{/n}"Я получила сообщение о перестрелке на нижней палубе. Вам удалось навести порядок? В каком состоянии Идира?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

"Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

languages.text: “舰长大人？”{n}音阵大师原本平静而矜持的声音，此刻不同寻常地颤抖着，声音中充满了静电的嗡嗡声。{/n}“我收到了报告，说下层甲板发生了枪击事件。您已经恢复秩序了吗？伊迪拉目前是什么情况？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人？”{n}音阵大师原本平静而矜持的声音，此刻不同寻常地颤抖着，声音中充满了静电的嗡嗡声。{/n}“我收到了报告，说下层甲板发生了枪击事件。您已经恢复秩序了吗？伊迪拉目前是什么情况？”

languages.text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos, normalmente tranquila y reservada, tiembla, revelando su preocupación a través de la estática.{/n} «Recibí su mensaje sobre los disparos en la cubierta inferior. ¿Logró restaurar el orden? ¿En qué estado se encuentra Idira?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Lord Capitán?». {n}La voz de la maestra de vocos, normalmente tranquila y reservada, tiembla, revelando su preocupación a través de la estática.{/n} «Recibí su mensaje sobre los disparos en la cubierta inferior. ¿Logró restaurar el orden? ¿En qué estado se encuentra Idira?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}普段は冷静で控えめなヴォクス・マスターの声が、静寂の中で裏切り者のように震えていた。{/n}「下層デッキで銃撃があったとの通報を受けました。秩序は取り戻せたでしょうか？イディラの状態は？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン？」{n}普段は冷静で控えめなヴォクス・マスターの声が、静寂の中で裏切り者のように震えていた。{/n}「下層デッキで銃撃があったとの通報を受けました。秩序は取り戻せたでしょうか？イディラの状態は？」

languages.text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Die ansonsten so ruhige und reservierte Stimme der Voxmeisterin zittert verräterisch, während sie gegen das Rauschen ankämpft.{/n} "Ich wurde über Schüsse auf dem Unterdeck informiert. Konntet Ihr die Ordnung wiederherstellen? In welchem Zustand ist Idira?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}Die ansonsten so ruhige und reservierte Stimme der Voxmeisterin zittert verräterisch, während sie gegen das Rauschen ankämpft.{/n} "Ich wurde über Schüsse auf dem Unterdeck informiert. Konntet Ihr die Ordnung wiederherstellen? In welchem Zustand ist Idira?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox, ordinairement calme et réservée, tremble traîtreusement à travers le faible grésillement des interférences.{/n} « J'ai reçu un message signalant une fusillade sur le pont inférieur. Avez-vous réussi à rétablir l'ordre ? Et Idira, comment se porte-t-elle ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? » {n}La voix de la maîtresse-vox, ordinairement calme et réservée, tremble traîtreusement à travers le faible grésillement des interférences.{/n} « J'ai reçu un message signalant une fusillade sur le pont inférieur. Avez-vous réussi à rétablir l'ordre ? Et Idira, comment se porte-t-elle ? »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Voks Üstadı'nın genelde sakin ve mesafeli olan ses tonu, düşük seviyeli parazitlerin arasından haince titreyerek çıkıyor.{/n} "Alt güvertede çatışma çıktığına dair bir mesaj aldım. Düzen yeniden tesis edildi mi? İdira ne durumda?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain?" {n}The Vox Master's voice, usually calm and reserved, shakes traitorously, fighting through the low-level static.{/n} "I received a message about shooting on the lower deck. Did you manage to restore order? What condition is Idira in?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan?" {n}Voks Üstadı'nın genelde sakin ve mesafeli olan ses tonu, düşük seviyeli parazitlerin arasından haince titreyerek çıkıyor.{/n} "Alt güvertede çatışma çıktığına dair bir mesaj aldım. Düzen yeniden tesis edildi mi? İdira ne durumda?"
